OCD.description: Used to query for metadata from Content Discovery and Retrieval (CDR) Search V1.1 compliant sources
OCD.name: Catalog OpenSearch Federated Source

AD.name: OpenSearch service URL
AD.description: The OpenSearch endpoint URL or DDF's OpenSearch endpoint (https://localhost:8993/services/catalog/query)

AD.name: Authentication Type
AD.description: The authentication type to use when federating.

AD.name: Username
AD.description: Username to use with HTTP Basic Authentication. Required if basic authentication type is selected.

AD.name: Password
AD.description: Password to use with HTTP Basic Authentication. Required if basic authentication type is selected.

AD.name: OAuth Discovery Url
AD.description: The Discovery URL where the metadata of the OAuth Provider protecting the source is hosted. Required if OAuth 2.0 authentication type is selected.

AD.name: OAuth Client ID
AD.description: Client ID registered with the OAuth provider. Required if OAuth 2.0 authentication type is selected.

AD.name: OAuth Client Secret
AD.description: Client Secret registered with the OAuth provider. Required if OAuth 2.0 authentication type is selected.

AD.name: OAuth Flow
AD.description: The OAuth flow to use when federating. Required if OAuth 2.0 authentication type is selected.

Option.label: Authorization Code Flow - federate user's token
Client Credential Flow - federate system's token

AD.name: OpenSearch query parameters
AD.description: Query parameters to use with the OpenSearch connection.

AD.name: Always perform local query
AD.description: When federating with other DDFs, keep this checked. If checked, this source performs a local query on the remote site (by setting src=local in endpoint URL), as opposed to an enterprise search.

AD.name: Convert to BBox
AD.description: Converts Polygon and Point-Radius searches to a Bounding Box for compatibility with older interfaces. Generated bounding box is a very rough representation of the input geometry.

AD.name: Multi Point-Radius polygon approximation vertices
AD.description: When performing a multi point-radius search, increase this value for more accurate polygon approximation. Minimum value is 4, maximum value is 32.

AD.name: Point radius polygon simplification distance tolerance
AD.description: The maximum distance from the original vertices a reduced vertex may lie on a simplified circular polygon
Disable CN check for the server certificate. This should only be used when testing.
AD.name: Disable CN Check

AD.description: Amount of time to attempt to establish a connection before timing out, in milliseconds.
AD.name: Connection Timeout

AD.description: Amount of time to wait for a response before timing out, in milliseconds.
AD.name: Receive Timeout

AD.description: Poll Interval to Check if the Source is available (in minutes - minimum 1).
AD.name: Poll Interval
Entry XML Element
AD.description: XML Element from the Response Entry to transform into a Metacard.
